Matches Management.title: Matches Management
Matches Management.description: Go to Matches Section to Add Match: Date, Time, Teams, Game, Tournament, Stream Links

Players.title: Players
Players.description: Go to players Section to Add Player: Name, Age, Country, Team, Game, Photos

Teams Management.title: Teams Management
Teams Management.description: Add Team: Name, Country, Linked Players, Logo/Images

Games Management.title: Games Management
Games Management.description: go to Games Section to Add Game: Name + Icon

News & Updates.title: News & Updates
News & Updates.description: Go to news Section to Add News: Title, Description, Image/Video, Author

Users.title: Users
Users.description: Go to user Section to view Users , Edit email and password , see favorite teams for each user

Support Center.title: Support Center
Support Center.description: Go to Support Center to view user messages and reply to them
